name: Dr. Nyario
description:
version 0.0.2

  • sped up the falling pills as it was way too slow for me
  • the crank UI notification disappears once you start a game
  • key repetition behavior for A/B to rotate the pill has been disabled (so now it requires you to physically press the button again, to prevent accidental rotations)
  • crank sensitivity has been changed from 5° to 25° (if this continues to be an issue I can add an option to change this in the level select screen however)
